message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you consider that?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $130 is still a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'm thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you consider that?
